turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order me a starbucks iced coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 9th and L street please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for pickup immediately or later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: now please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande in a venti cup, extra ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how about almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sweetener in the iced coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes but one less than pump than regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay can i get you anything else? any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so a grande iced coffee in a venti with extra ice, sweetener minus one pump and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I put it in and it should be ready soon for pickup. i'll text you the receipt to your cell.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks! i'm on my way there right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day!
